measure.name: add_os_water_heater_mixed_storage_electric
measure.description: This measure adds an OS:WaterHeater:Mixed object representing an Electric Storage Water Heater. Users will be asked to provide 1) Plant Loop Assignment 2) Tank Volume 3) Energy Factor 4) Tank Location 5) SHW Setpoint 6) Deadband Temperature
measure.modeler_description: The measure will create a new instance of the OS:WaterHeater:Mixed object. The object will either create a new plant loop, or be assigned to an existing plant loop. The object will be configured be to use the user arguments. The EIO file reports the industry standard ratings of Recovery Efficiency and Energy Factor for water heater objects.

argument.name: object_to_be_created
argument.display_name: How will this measure be used?

choice.value: Create a water heater representing B10 Benchmark standard
choice.display_name: Create a water heater representing B10 Benchmark standard

choice.value: Create a water heater representing NCTH standard
choice.display_name: Create a water heater representing NCTH standard

choice.value: Create a water heater representing BA Pre-Retrofit Case standard
choice.display_name: Create a water heater representing BA Pre-Retrofit Case standard

argument.name: number_of_bedrooms
argument.display_name: Number of Bedrooms in the Proposed Home

argument.name: number_of_bathrooms
argument.display_name: Number of Bathrooms in the Proposed Home

argument.name: existing_plant_loop_name
argument.display_name: Plant Loop to assign Water heater as a Supply Equipment

argument.name: storage_tank_volume
argument.display_name: Volume of the Storage Tank (gallons) of the Electric Hot Water Heater. Set to 0 to have Storage tank volume autosized. This field is ignored for NCTH and B10 protocols.

argument.name: rated_energy_factor
argument.display_name: Rated Energy Factor of Electric Storage Tank Water Heater. This field is ignored for NCTH and B10 protocols.

argument.name: water_heater_location
argument.display_name: Thermal Zone where the Electric Storage Water Heater is located

argument.name: water_heater_capacity
argument.display_name: The nominal capacity [W] of the electric storage water heater. Set to 0 to have this field autosized. This field is ignored for NCTH or B10 protocols.
